title: Did the server stop?
body: Me and my friend were playing league, but then all of a sudden the game displayed, "starting to reconnect". Both of us simultaneously got the message. The game has been stuck for a good 5 minutes now, please help.

replies.body: I haven't noticed any widespread sever issues today, but if you and your friend were on the same network or internet provider theres a good chance that you both had the same issue at the same time. Let's do a quick checkup on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is in order there first.
